sentences.en: Unfortunately these drugs are quite toxic and hinder the body's ability to fight off infection.
sentences.cn: 不幸的是，这些药毒性很大，妨碍身体抗感染的能力。

sentences.en: It will only slow you down and hinder your career goals.
sentences.cn: 这只会拖慢你的速度，阻碍你的职业目标。

sentences.en: My duty forbids it, sir; prithee hinder me not, the night comes on.
sentences.cn: 我的职责禁止这样，先生；请不要妨碍我，天要黑了。
